vocabulary_focus.concept: I'll get back to you / I will revert

expressions.cn: 我会回复你 (Wǒ huì huífù nǐ)
expressions.bm_formal: Saya akan maklumkan semula. / Saya akan kembali semula kepada anda.
expressions.bm_casual: Nanti saya *get back*. / Nanti saya bagi tahu.

expressions.cn: 感谢您的理解 (Gǎnxiè nín de lǐjiě)

vocabulary_focus.concept: Please inform me / Let me know

expressions.en: Please inform me. / Let me know.
expressions.bm_formal: Mohon maklumkan saya. / Sila beritahu saya.

expressions.cn: 我为造成的不便道歉 (Wǒ wèi zàochéng de bùbiàn dàoqiàn)
expressions.bm_formal: Saya memohon maaf atas kesulitan yang berlaku.
expressions.bm_casual: Maaf sangat atas kesulitan. / Sorry sangat susahkan.

vocabulary_focus.concept: Could you please assist? / Can you help?

expressions.en: Could you please assist? / Can you help?
expressions.cn: 你能帮忙吗？ (Nǐ néng bāngmáng ma?)
expressions.bm_formal: Bolehkah anda membantu? / Mohon bantuan anda.

work.scenario: You're coordinating a team project. You need to confirm a task's completion with a colleague and apologize for a slight delay in providing some resources, promising an update soon.
key_phrases: Saya memohon maaf atas kesulitan kelewatan bahan.
Saya akan maklumkan semula secepat mungkin.

life.scenario: You're organizing a surprise birthday party for a friend. You need to confirm attendance with guests and apologize for a last-minute change in venue, promising to update them with the new location.
key_phrases: Maaf sangat atas kesulitan perubahan lokasi.
Nanti saya bagi tahu lokasi baru.

tech.scenario: You're experiencing a critical software bug during a presentation. You need to ask a tech support agent for immediate help, thank them for their patience, and ask them to keep you informed about the fix.
key_phrases: Bolehkah anda membantu dengan isu ini?
Terima kasih atas kefahaman anda, ini mendesak.
